subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After four N.B.A. titles and three Coach of the Year awards, the Spurs’ Gregg Popovich maintains a bond with a tiny college conference.
snippet: After four N.B.A. titles and three Coach of the Year awards, the Spurs’ Gregg Popovich maintains a bond with a tiny college conference.
